name: unaddressed
content:
unaddressed adjective
(PROBLEM)
Add to word list
Add to word list
If a matter or problem is unaddressed, no one has given attention to it or dealt with it: This review aims to identify some important issues that remain unaddressed. The issue of bullying was left unaddressed by school officials.
More examplesFewer examplesAre we going to leave such an important question unaddressed for another year?Several key areas remain unaddressed by the report.She has a complicated medical problem that has been unaddressed for years.

unaddressed adjective
(ENVELOPE)
If an envelope or parcel is unaddressed, there is no name or address written on it: The letter was unaddressed and unsigned. Someone had left a large unaddressed parcel on my desk. Related word
address
